title: Chairman Schiff on Russian Invasion of Ukraine
summary: “Over the past few months, as Russia has built a large military force on the border of Ukraine, we have sought to prevent and deter an invasion. It is clear that despite our unified efforts with our allies and Ukraine, Vladimir Putin has chosen war. A massive Russian invasion of Ukraine has begun. “As President Zelensky said this evening, the people of Ukraine want peace and the right to determine...

title: Chairman Schiff on Sanctions Against Russia for Invading Ukraine
summary: “Vladimir Putin’s latest invasion of Ukraine is another intolerable assault by Russia on the sovereignty of its neighbor and international law. He is terrified by the prospect of another democracy on Russia’s border and the alternative the Russian people see to his despotic rule. “The Biden administration has acted quickly, in close coordination with our allies, to deliver significant consequences...
